channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New research on ancient life found in Yellowstone hot springs
item.description: New work offers insight into how early life adapted from a low-oxygen atmosphere to the one that exists today.

item.title: Researchers solve a fluid mechanics mystery
item.description: Seven years ago, researchers caught an unexpected phenomenon on film: A pool of red dye that somehow 'knew' how to solve a maze filled with milk. Prop...

item.title: Slow traffic, fast food: Study links road delays with unhealthy eating
item.description: Ever notice how much more tempting it is to pick up fast food for dinner after being stuck in traffic? It's not just you. New research shows that traf...

item.title: Life-bearing water arrived on Earth later rather than sooner
item.description: Scientist have concluded water did not arrive as early during Earth's formation as previously thought, an insight that bears directly on the question ...

item.title: The cost of preventing extinction of Australia's priority species
item.description: A new study has estimated it would cost $15.6 billion per year for 30 years to prevent extinction for 99 of Australia's priority species. The research...
